name: Break the food chain (itch)
description:
DESCRIPTION:
Nature, while beautiful, can be deadly for humans. Just take a look at any social network to see how dogs and cats control the human mind with things like 'cuteness'. This game is a simulation of what would happen if God forgot to control nature for a moment and a carnivorous plant took advantage of it to start it's plans to conquer the world.

I can't put the simulator tag to this game since it hasn't been scientifically proven that carnivorous plants behave this way; but to that i say that it hasn't been proven YET.

CONTROLS:
-Right-Click: The plant will attack the position where the mouse is located when you press it
-G: When you have enough points you can press G to make the plant grow, a.k.a. go to the next level.

RAMBLING:
Anyways, this was made for My First Game Jam 2022. I participated in the previous Jam and, like last time, this game has no audio. But, unlike last time, i actually attempted to make the audio for the game. Sadly i discovered that you need more than a day and 2 functioning brain cells to make it, and that's all i had by the end of the game jam. Maybe some day i'll do it, but who knows.

Thanks for coming to see my game!

'Till next time, friendly stranger ;)
